text.div:
Arboviral Disease [Other] (Tests for Arbovirus [Other] Antigen)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    23148-0 Japanese encephalitis virus Ag [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by Immunofluorescence
    23149-8 Japanese encephalitis virus Ag [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by Hemagglutination inhibition
    23548-1 Venezuelan equine encephalitis virus Ag [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by Neutralization test
    23549-9 Venezuelan equine encephalitis virus Ag [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by Immunofluorescence
    23550-7 Venezuelan equine encephalitis virus Ag [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by Hemagglutination inhibition
    23551-5 Venezuelan equine encephalitis virus Ag [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by Complement fixation
    31866-7 Japanese encephalitis virus Ag [Presence] in Unspecified specimen
    31983-0 Venezuelan equine encephalitis virus Ag [Presence] in Serum
    31984-8 Venezuelan equine encephalitis virus Ag [Presence] in Unspecified specimen
    6572-2 Venezuelan equine encephalitis virus Ag [Presence] in Serum by Immunoassay
    6573-0 Venezuelan equine encephalitis virus Ag [Presence] in Serum by Immunofluorescence
    71699-3 Flavivirus Ag [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by Immune stain
